ovdesc.p: IS.AUTO.PAY.SCHEDULES.HIST is a table to store the processed payments those are scheduled. This table gets updated after the job IS.SOD.PAYMENT.SCHEDULE processes the scheduled payment. This job deletes the copy in the file IS.AUTO.PAY.SCHEDULES after copying to this file.

desc.p: The schedule date on which the vendor or cost payment has to be processed.
The ID of the table IS.AUTO.PAY.SCHEDULES is of 2 formats:
1. <ASSET.ID>-<VENDOR.ID>-<DATE> - for a Vendor payment of an Asset.
2. <PURCHASE.ID>-<COST.ID>-<DATE> - for a cost payment of a Purchase contract.
The vendor or cost amount to be paid on the scheduled date.
The payment reference for which the payment has to be processed. (ID of the file IS.PAYMENT)
The retention amount to be retained on the scheduled date.
